mapper.insert: insert into selling_car (seller_id, manufacturer_id, model_id, car_type, detail_model_id, color, fuel, drive_type, mileage, location, buy_date, price) values (#{sellerId}, #{manufacturerId}, #{modelId}, #{carType}, #{detailModelId}, #{color}, #{fuel}, #{driveType}, #{mileage}, #{location}, #{buyDate}, #{price})
